column5: Hi guys,  I would like to know if somebody doing ice fishing in Bernard Lake, if so - maybe somebody can share how is fishing there right now.  Thanks
A guy got 1 5# laker, 1 whitey and 2 perch today. My buddies have been doing alright on lakers and whiteys.
Bernard good and thick Nip??? always one of the last to freeze.
I am planning to go where on Saturday. Just wondering if somebody can give me some advices - place to start, lures, etc. Thanks.
Some huts are out off of Union St. (North end of Lake Bernard)
This is completely off topic, but a buddy told me Lake Bernard is the largest lake in the world without an island... is this true?
That's what their sign claims! Has to be true...
I will try that lake in a couple days. Will try to start from that point Nipfisher told - out of Union St.  Nipfisher do you know if is where a bait shop somewhere close to the lake???
